photorealistic.prompt: A high-quality, photorealistic wide shot of a modern solar panel installation on a rural Indian rooftop in Chhattisgarh. Warm golden hour lighting (Primary Color #FFB400). In the background, lush green fields and a subtle outline of the Chhattisgarh map in the sky. Overlay text in clean, modern white typography (Inter font): 'Solar subsidies & installations - Chhattisgarh'. Professional, optimistic, sustainable energy vibe. 1200x630 resolution.
photorealistic.alt_text: Solar panels on a rooftop in Chhattisgarh with golden sunlight

flat_illustration.prompt: A modern, flat vector illustration of a house with solar panels on the roof. Stylized sun rays in warm yellow (#FFB400) and teal (#06B6D4) accents. Background features a simplified map outline of Chhattisgarh. Minimalist design, clean lines, solid colors (Deep Indigo #0F172A for shadows). Text overlay: 'Solar subsidies & installations - Chhattisgarh'. 1200x630 resolution.
flat_illustration.alt_text: Illustration of solar rooftop installation in Chhattisgarh
